Description: Pale-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text with a further line of black-painted Greek text beneath.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51689) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51689)
Wangstedt 1970-1971 / Demotische Steuerquittungen aus ptolemäische-römischer Zeit (pp.34-5)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
